text:
In my JSP, there is a taglib directive like the following:
<%@ taglib uri="../tld/sca.tld" prefix="sca" %>
There is no entry in the web.xml file for this tag library.  The sca.tld file is 
located in the ../tld directory, relative to the current page.  (Yes, it is 
really there).  If I specify uri="/tld/sca.tld", it works.

This form of the taglib directive (uri="../tld/sca.tld") does work in 3.2.1.  It 
does not work in either 3.3m1 or 3.3m2

I experience the same behavior on Win2k and RH Linux 7.0.

When I try to access the JSP when using uri="../tld/sca.tld", I get the 
following error:

text:
This occurs when using JspInterceptor in Tomcat 3.3m1 and 3.3m2. The
JasperEngineContext was missing an implementation for resolveRelativeUri().

For query purposes, mark as fixed in Tomcat 3.3
Fixed in Tomcat 3.3
